data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3059161,"name":"Zachary Friedman-Hill","username":"zacfmhill","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zacfmhill/{size}/161817_2.png","created_at":"2022-05-08T23:10:19.048Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eFIRST Robotics Team 4099 is excited to announce that we’re hosting FalconCamps again this year! After earning the Autonomous and Industrial Design awards in our district events and reaching the World Finals in our Rapid React competition season, we are eager to share our passion for STEM with any interested students or rookie teams.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eFalconCamps is a virtual one-week camp where experienced members of Team 4099 will teach FRC related mechanical design and/or programming. The design camps will cover conceptualization and computer-aided-design with Onshape, and the programming camps will discuss object-oriented programming with Python. Middle and high schoolers (and even adult mentors) living anywhere in the world can participate! We highly encourage anyone who wants to learn more about robotics to sign up, no experience required.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eClick \u003ca href=\"https://www.team4099.com/programs/falconcamps/\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003ehere\u003c/a\u003e to take a look at our programs’ website. If you or someone you know might be interested in either of these programs, registration is open! If you have any questions, feel free to email Team 4099 at \u003ca href=\"mailto:falconcamps@team4099.com\"\u003efalconcamps@team4099.com\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2022-05-08T23:10:39.906Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":32,"reads":170,"readers_count":169,"score":269.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":411192,"topic_slug":"team-4099-falconcamps-cad-and-programming-training","display_username":"Zachary Friedman-Hill","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.team4099.com/programs/falconcamps/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Programs - FalconCamps - Team 4099","clicks":57}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":48131,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC4099 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/team-4099-falconcamps-cad-and-programming-training/411192/1","custom_user_title":"FRC4099 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3205371,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2023-05-08T23:10:30.225Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
